attributes.action: We are looking for a regulations in the locksmith industry.
attributes.additional_details: We would welcome the government to regulate the industry to protect the public and stamp out rogue traders.
attributes.background: Regardless of background, training and experience anyone can turn up at your door claiming to be an expert locksmith. Reputation  hardworking experienced locksmiths can quickly be tarnished by the poor skills or extortionate prices charged by a few poorly trained, inexperienced or rogue locksmiths.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to regulate the industry 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
